free.workarounds
Class FixedTableColumn

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.TableColumn
      free.workarounds.FixedTableColumn
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FixedTableColumn
extends javax.swing.table.TableColumn

A fix for TableColumn. Fixes the following bugs:

  • TableColumn.getHeaderRenderer() default to null

See Also:
Serialized Form
